Replace.Text: A district that provides this city with a source of fresh water from an adjacent River, Lake, Oasis, or Mountain. Cities that do not yet have existing fresh water receive up to 6 [ICON_Housing] Housing. Cities that already have existing fresh water will instead get +2 [ICON_Housing] Housing. Must be built adjacent to the City Center.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Food] Food to adjacent tiles.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Food] Food to Oases.

A district in your city for scientific endeavors.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Science] Science to [ICON_RESOURCE_MERCURY] Mercury, [ICON_RESOURCE_TEA] Tea, and [ICON_RESOURCE_TOBACCO] Tobacco resources.

A district in your city specializing in finance and trade.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Gold] Gold to [ICON_RESOURCE_FURS] Furs, [ICON_RESOURCE_SALT] Salt, [ICON_RESOURCE_COTTON] Cotton, [ICON_RESOURCE_DYES] Dyes, [ICON_RESOURCE_SILK] Silk, [ICON_RESOURCE_SPICES] Spices, [ICON_RESOURCE_SUGAR] Sugar, [ICON_RESOURCE_TOBACCO] Tobacco, and [ICON_RESOURCE_SILVER] Silver resources.

A district in your city for military facilities.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Production] Production to [ICON_RESOURCE_COPPER] Copper, [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] Iron, [ICON_RESOURCE_HORSES] Horses, and [ICON_RESOURCE_NITER] Niter resources.

A district unique to Brazil. Replaces the Entertainment Complex district, and provides +2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities. Also unlocks the Carnival project, which grants an additional +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity when underway and a variety of [ICON_GreatPerson] Great People points once completed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold to [ICON_RESOURCE_COCOA] Cocoa, [ICON_RESOURCE_TRUFFLES] Truffles, and [ICON_RESOURCE_IVORY] Ivory resources.
A district in your city for religious worship.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith to [ICON_RESOURCE_STONE] Stone, [ICON_RESOURCE_INCENSE] Incense, and [ICON_RESOURCE_WINE] Wine resources.

A district in your city for industrial activity.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Production] Production to [ICON_RESOURCE_GYPSUM] Gypsum, [ICON_RESOURCE_ALUMINUM] Aluminum, [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] Coal, and [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] Oil resources.

A district in your city for cultural sites.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Culture] Culture to [ICON_RESOURCE_COFFEE] Coffee, [ICON_RESOURCE_TEA] Tea, [ICON_RESOURCE_MARBLE] Marble, [ICON_RESOURCE_DIAMONDS] Diamonds, and [ICON_RESOURCE_JADE] Jade resources.

A district unique to Rome for city growth. Replaces the Aqueduct district.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]It provides this city with a source of fresh water from an adjacent River, Lake, Oasis, or Mountain. Cities that do not yet have existing fresh water receive up to 6 [ICON_Housing] Housing. Cities that already have existing fresh water will instead get +2 [ICON_Housing] Housing. Must be built adjacent to the City Center. In either case, the Bath provides an additional bonus of +4 [ICON_Housing] Housing and +2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity. Must be built adjacent to the City Center.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Food] Food to adjacent tiles.[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Food] Food to Oases.

A district in your city dedicated to keeping your people happy by increasing [ICON_Amenities] Amenities.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold to [ICON_RESOURCE_COCOA] Cocoa, [ICON_RESOURCE_TRUFFLES] Truffles, and [ICON_RESOURCE_IVORY] Ivory resources.

A district unique to Russia for religious activity. Replaces the Holy Site district.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Your city border grows by one tile each time a Great Person is expended in this city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_Faith] Faith to [ICON_RESOURCE_STONE] Stone, [ICON_RESOURCE_INCENSE] Incense, and [ICON_RESOURCE_WINE] Wine resources.

A district unique to Germany for industrial activity. Replaces the Industrial Zone district.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Production] Production to [ICON_RESOURCE_GYPSUM] Gypsum, [ICON_RESOURCE_ALUMINUM] Aluminum, [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] Coal, and [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] Oil resources.

A district unique to Greece for cultural sites. Replaces the Theater Square district.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Culture] Culture to [ICON_RESOURCE_COFFEE] Coffee, [ICON_RESOURCE_TEA] Tea, and [ICON_RESOURCE_MARBLE] Marble resources.

A district unique to England for naval activity in your city. Replaces the Harbor district. Also removes the [ICON_Movement] Movement penalty for embarking and disembarking to and from this tile. Must be built on Coast or Lake Terrain adjacent to land.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Movement] Movement for all naval units built in Dockyard[NEWLINE]+4 [ICON_Gold] Gold when built on a foreign continent[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity
+{1_num} [ICON_Gold] Gold from the adjacent {1_Num : plural 1?resource; other?resources;}.
+{1_num} [ICON_Culture] Culture from the adjacent Coast {1_Num : plural 1?tile; other?tiles;}.
区域从相邻的河流、湖泊、绿洲或山脉引水，为该城市提供淡水资源。没有淡水资源的城市最多获得6个 [ICON_Housing] 住房。相反，已有淡水资源的城市 [ICON_Housing] 住房数量+2。必须靠近城市中心修建。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]邻接地块+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。[NEWLINE]绿洲+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。
您城市中的科学发展区。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE] [ICON_RESOURCE_MERCURY] 水银、 [ICON_RESOURCE_TEA] 茶 和 [ICON_RESOURCE_TOBACCO] 烟草资源分别+1 [ICON_Science] 科研值。

您城市里用于金融和贸易的区域。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线容量。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_FURS] 皮草、 [ICON_RESOURCE_SALT] 盐、 [ICON_RESOURCE_COTTON] 棉花、 [ICON_RESOURCE_DYES] 染料、 [ICON_RESOURCE_SILK] 丝绸、 [ICON_RESOURCE_SPICES] 香料、 [ICON_RESOURCE_SUGAR] 糖、 [ICON_RESOURCE_TOBACCO] 烟草和 [ICON_RESOURCE_SILVER] 白银资源分别+1 [ICON_Gold] 金币。
您城市里的军事机构区。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_COPPER] 铜、 [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] 铁、 [ICON_RESOURCE_HORSES] 马和 [ICON_RESOURCE_NITER] 硝石资源分别+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。
您城市里的该区域致力于通过增加 [ICON_Amenities] 宜居度让您的人民开心。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_COCOA] 可可、 [ICON_RESOURCE_TRUFFLES] 松露和 [ICON_RESOURCE_IVORY] 象牙资源分别+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值和 [ICON_Gold] 金币。
您城市里的宗教祭祀区。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_STONE] 石头、 [ICON_RESOURCE_INCENSE] 熏香和 [ICON_RESOURCE_WINE] 红酒资源分别+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值。
您城市里的工业活动区。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_GYPSUM] 石膏、 [ICON_RESOURCE_ALUMINUM] 铝、 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] 煤和 [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] 石油资源分别+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。
您城市里的文化遗址区。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_COFFEE] 咖啡、 [ICON_RESOURCE_TEA] 茶、 [ICON_RESOURCE_MARBLE] 大理石、 [ICON_RESOURCE_DIAMONDS] 钻石和 [ICON_RESOURCE_JADE] 玉石资源分别+2 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。

促进城市发展的罗马特色区。取代水渠。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]从相邻的河流、湖泊、绿洲或山脉引水，为该城市提供淡水资源。没有淡水资源的城市最多获得6个 [ICON_Housing] 住房。已有淡水资源的城市 [ICON_Housing] 住房数量+2。无论哪种情况浴场都能提供额外+4 [ICON_Housing] 住房和+2 [ICON_Amenities] 宜居度加成。必须靠近城市中心修建。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]邻接地块+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。[NEWLINE]绿洲+1 [ICON_Food] 食物。

巴西特色区域。代替娱乐宜居度区，提供+2 [ICON_Amenities] 宜居度。同时解锁狂欢节项目，狂欢节项目开始时即可提供+1 [ICON_Amenities] 宜居度，项目完成后可获得若干 [ICON_GreatPerson] 伟人点数。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_COCOA] 可可、 [ICON_RESOURCE_TRUFFLES] 松露和 [ICON_RESOURCE_IVORY] 象牙资源分别+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值和 [ICON_Gold] 金币。
您城市里的俄罗斯特色宗教活动区域。代替圣地区域。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]修道院所在城市每消耗一位伟人，则城市边境扩展一单元格。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_STONE] 石头、 [ICON_RESOURCE_INCENSE] 熏香和 [ICON_RESOURCE_WINE] 红酒资源分别+2 [ICON_Faith] 信仰值。
您城市里的德国特色工业活动区。代替工业区。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_GYPSUM] 石膏、 [ICON_RESOURCE_ALUMINUM] 铝、 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] 煤和 [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] 石油资源分别+1 [ICON_Production] 生产力。
希腊特色文化遗址区。代替剧院广场区。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][NEWLINE][ICON_RESOURCE_COFFEE] 咖啡、 [ICON_RESOURCE_TEA] 茶和 [ICON_RESOURCE_MARBLE] 大理石资源分别+1 [ICON_Culture] 文化值。

您城市里的英国特色海军活动区。取代港口。同时移除该单元格的上船、下船 [ICON_Movement] 移动力减益。必须建在靠近陆地的海岸或湖泊地形上。[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]为造船厂所建的所有海军单位+1 [ICON_Movement] 移动力[NEWLINE]当建造在海外大陆时，+4 [ICON_Gold] 金币[NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] 贸易路线容量
+{1_num} [ICON_Gold] 金币来自相邻{1_Num : plural 1?资源; other?资源;}。
+{1_num} [ICON_Culture] 文化值来自相邻海岸{1_Num : plural 1?单元格; other?单元格;}。
